code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from"react";import Carousel from"react-multi-carousel";import"react-multi-carousel/lib/styles.css";import"./Mcarousel.scss";import{API_URL}from"../../config/contansts";import axios from'axios';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function App(){const[halls,setHalls]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{axios.get("".concat(API_URL,"/api/hall")).then(res=>{setHalls(res.data);console.log(res.data);}).catch(err=>{console.log(err);});},[]);const responsive={superLargeDesktop:{breakpoint:{max:4000,min:3000},items:5},desktop:{breakpoint:{max:3000,min:1024},items:3},tablet:{breakpoint:{max:1024,min:464},items:2},mobile:{breakpoint:{max:464,min:0},items:1}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"App3",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{style:{position:"relative"},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Carousel,{responsive:responsive,children:halls.map(hall=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:API_URL+hall.hallImg}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:hall.hallName}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["\uC218\uC6A9\uC778\uC6D0 ",hall.Capacity,"\uBA85. \uC8FC\uCC28\uAC00\uB2A5 ",hall.ParkingCapacity]})]}))})})});}
